text:
Hey <@U6GNQ7JBU> there is anyway to mix the results with HubDB and the website? Or I need to do two queries and mix manually?
(I want to show all the result for one search including the HubDB results)
Dynamic pages are considered site pages so they are included automatically with results
Are you not seeing them mixed?
Can you DM an example query?
The issue with some dynamic pages not showing up the index has been fixed now.

<@UAA6C2XQU> added `featuredImageUrl` as a field to site pages along with parsing `og` meta tags. Now for `title`, `description`, and `featuredImageUrl`, we first look at the `og` meta tags and only default to the content values if they are not present. This should be available on reindex <20 hours
<@U6GNQ7JBU> where can we find the most up to date documentation for the HubSpot Search?
<@U2H3TT8F2> We are working on a larger set of public docs for Site Search.  Unfortunately I don’t have anything to offer you right now. More to come shortly…
I can quickly write up all the current query params and sticky those to this channel for now until the official docs are up
